name: Secret Mysteries in London
summary: 1920. When a politician is found murdered in the park, the local police make the unconventional decision to ask Oscar Gaebelein, a young forensic scientist, for help. Motivated by his desire to prove his value to the investigating team, Oscar throws himself head first into the investigation. But soon, he and his colleagues find out that this first murder is only the beginning of a sinister bread crumb trail.
